addr: 8 John Adam St London WC2N 6EZ GB
title: RSA Engage: London
desc: RSA London Engage: Collaboration in Action Wednesday 2 December 2015 18:00 - 20:00 The Great Room, RSA, 8 John Adam Street,  London, WC2N 6EZ Join us for a special RSA Engage event dedicated to celebrating some of the RSA's fantastic partnerships and to bringing together people from their diverse networks.? We will be welcoming speakers and guests from our partner organisations, alongside RSA Fellows, for an exciting evening of networking, collaboration, and ideas-sharing.The evening will feature lightning talks and project pitches from speakers from the following organisations: This will be followed by speed networking and the chance to meet our speakers.  This event offers a unique opportunity to hear about some of the innovative and inspiring work our partners are doing and to make some exciting new connections. ?? Drinks will be available on arrival. Please note this will be a standing event. Limited seating will be available for those who require it. Please contact a member of staff on the night if you require any assistance. This event is free to attend, but you do need to register. Please register according to the organisation you are connected with. You do not need to be a Fellow of the RSA to attend this event.  If you have any questions, please do contact  Vivs :  viv.long-ferguson@rsa.org.uk
